name: Tipperary
description: The Tipperary is a lovely drink, and with the Irish whiskey and the green liqueur, it's got everything you need to celebrate St. Patrick's Day in style.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine whiskey and vermouth in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well for 20 seconds. Pour the Chartreuse into a chilled cocktail glass, and rotate the glass to coat the sides with the liqueur. Discard the excess (if desired—if you’re a fan of Chartreuse like I am, you can let it be), and strain the chilled cocktail into the glass.
